A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best movies in the last 10 years.  I love the complicated\, human way they dealt with Luke\, Kylo\, and Rey.  While still larger than life mythic heroes (see final battle with Luke - awesome!)\, the humanity in them is what makes them pop.  Beautiful\, exciting\, funny\, inspiring\, and epic.  And\, you know\, women.  There were actually women all over the place!  Nice to near the 50/50 mark on male-to-female characters-I've never seen anything like it.  My favorite Star Wars movie to date!
